sentences.sentence: On his website, Prof Heppel offers advice to schools on how to implement 'a shoeless' policy.
sentences.translation: 赫佩尔教授在其网站上就如何施行“赤脚”政策，给学校提供了各种建议。

sentences.sentence: We are forbidden from giving money to these shoeless, skinny children, as this will perpetuate begging.
sentences.translation: 向光着脚，骨瘦如柴的孩子施舍是不可以的，因为要招来无休无止的乞讨。

sentences.sentence: Many comments said he "did the right thing" and that the shoeless man was "breaking public order and morals".
sentences.translation: 很多网友评论说，他“做的很对”，光脚的游客“违背了公共秩序和道德”。
